trans-unit.source: Deploy Lookout for Work app | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Deploy Lookout for Work app | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Configure and deploy Lookout for Work apps for Android.
trans-unit.target: Configure and deploy Lookout for Work apps for Android.

trans-unit.source: Configure and deploy Lookout for Work apps
trans-unit.target: Configure and deploy Lookout for Work apps

trans-unit.source: In this release, Lookout for work app on Android devices running 4.1 and later is supported.
trans-unit.target: In this release, Lookout for work app on Android devices running 4.1 and later is supported.

trans-unit.source: Android
trans-unit.target: Android

trans-unit.source: This section discusses how to configure and deploy the Lookout for Work application for Android devices enrolled in Intune.
trans-unit.target: This section discusses how to configure and deploy the Lookout for Work application for Android devices enrolled in Intune.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: In the [Microsoft Intune administrator console](https://manage.microsoft.com), go to **Apps** and choose **Add Apps**.
trans-unit.target: Step 1: In the [Microsoft Intune administrator console](https://manage.microsoft.com), go to **Apps** and choose **Add Apps**.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: On the **Software Setup** page of the publisher, choose **External link**, and specify the following URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lookout.enterprise
trans-unit.target: Step 2: On the **Software Setup** page of the publisher, choose **External link**, and specify the following URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lookout.enterprise

trans-unit.source: Do not click the box for requiring a managed browser.
trans-unit.target: Do not click the box for requiring a managed browser.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: On the **Software description** page fill in the following information:
trans-unit.target: Step 3: On the **Software description** page fill in the following information:

trans-unit.source: **Publisher:** Lookout Mobile Security
trans-unit.target: **Publisher:** Lookout Mobile Security

trans-unit.source: **Name:** Lookout for Work
trans-unit.target: **Name:** Lookout for Work

trans-unit.source: **Description:** Lookout offers the best protection against mobile threats to keep your device safe.
trans-unit.target: **Description:** Lookout offers the best protection against mobile threats to keep your device safe.

trans-unit.source: When the Lookout app is installed on the device, the app protects your device from threats and will alert you, and your company administrator, if any are found.
trans-unit.target: When the Lookout app is installed on the device, the app protects your device from threats and will alert you, and your company administrator, if any are found.

trans-unit.source: **Category:** Computer Management
trans-unit.target: **Category:** Computer Management

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Upon successful completion you see a message **Upload of data to Microsoft Intune successfully completed**.
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Upon successful completion you see a message **Upload of data to Microsoft Intune successfully completed**.

trans-unit.source: On the Intune Console when you click on the **Apps** you will now see the Lookout for Work app in the list ![screenshot of Intune admin console apps page showing the Lookout for work apps in the list
trans-unit.target: On the Intune Console when you click on the **Apps** you will now see the Lookout for Work app in the list ![screenshot of Intune admin console apps page showing the Lookout for work apps in the list

trans-unit.source: Step 5: At this point Intune knows how to deploy the Lookout for work android app.
trans-unit.target: Step 5: At this point Intune knows how to deploy the Lookout for work android app.

trans-unit.source: You can deploy the app to users, by selecting the Lookout for Work app shown in the screen above and selecting **Manage Deployment**.
trans-unit.target: You can deploy the app to users, by selecting the Lookout for Work app shown in the screen above and selecting **Manage Deployment**.

trans-unit.source: You must select the same users added in to the Enrollment Management option in the Lookout MTP console.
trans-unit.target: You must select the same users added in to the Enrollment Management option in the Lookout MTP console.

trans-unit.source: See Step 3 in the [configure your subscription with Lookout MTP section](set-up-your-subscription-with-lookout-mtp#configure-your-subscription-with-lookout-mtp) for information about adding user groups to Lookout MTP.
trans-unit.target: See Step 3 in the [configure your subscription with Lookout MTP section](set-up-your-subscription-with-lookout-mtp#configure-your-subscription-with-lookout-mtp) for information about adding user groups to Lookout MTP.

trans-unit.source: The Intune app deployment Wizard is not aware of the Azure AD user groups and uses the Intune user groups instead.
trans-unit.target: The Intune app deployment Wizard is not aware of the Azure AD user groups and uses the Intune user groups instead.

trans-unit.source: So you must create an Intune user group based on the Azure AD user group that is enrolled in the Lookout MTP console as described in [this](plan-your-user-and-device-groups.md)topic.
trans-unit.target: So you must create an Intune user group based on the Azure AD user group that is enrolled in the Lookout MTP console as described in [this](plan-your-user-and-device-groups.md)topic.

trans-unit.source: Step 6: Choose the **Required Install** option to require that the Lookout app be installed on the user’s device.
trans-unit.target: Step 6: Choose the **Required Install** option to require that the Lookout app be installed on the user’s device.

trans-unit.source: Device activation
trans-unit.target: Device activation

trans-unit.source: With the **Required Install** option selected for deployment, Intune will push the Lookout for work application to the device.
trans-unit.target: With the **Required Install** option selected for deployment, Intune will push the Lookout for work application to the device.

trans-unit.source: When the user opens the Lookout for Work on the device they are prompted to activate the app, and choose the Sign in with Azure Active Directory option.
trans-unit.target: When the user opens the Lookout for Work on the device they are prompted to activate the app, and choose the Sign in with Azure Active Directory option.

trans-unit.source: A detailed walkthrough with the end-user flow can be found in the following topics:
trans-unit.target: A detailed walkthrough with the end-user flow can be found in the following topics:

trans-unit.source: You are prompted to install Lookout for Work on your Android device
trans-unit.target: You are prompted to install Lookout for Work on your Android device

trans-unit.source: You need to resolve a threat that Lookout for Work found on your Android device
trans-unit.target: You need to resolve a threat that Lookout for Work found on your Android device

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Enable device threat protection rule in the compliance policy
trans-unit.target: Enable device threat protection rule in the compliance policy
